archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.4.7d: d) helps identify possible information security breaches (e.g. by logging events such as connections and terminations in a database and collating them centrally).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
